title: Is Ezreal Gay? (Gay champions)
body: So far from the rework of ezreal all his interactions look a bit off especially his dance, I thought he had a thing with lux but now im having second thoughts about that since in the neeko x ezreal interaction she says he looks pretty. too pretty. And now im seeing in the splash art for the pajama party that hes at a girls pajama party. I also realize that neeko seems to be gay as well, can we confirm tarics sexuality
